import_declaration.extractor:
text = code_snippet.split('import', 1)[1].strip()
if (' as ' in text):
    # removing the alias
    text = text.split(' as ')[0].strip()
if (' exposing ' in text):
    # removing the 'exposing' clause
    text = text.split(' exposing ')[0].strip()
if ('{' in text):
    # removing the namespace selector
    text = text.split('{')[0].strip()
self.extracted = text

function_definition.extractor:
temp_0 = code_snippet.split('def')[1].strip() 
temp_1 = temp_0.split('(')[0].strip() 
temp_2 = temp_1.split(':')[0].strip() 
self.extracted = temp_2
